guilds: - 무덤 길드 (Mudeom Guild) – Orientation: A Monarch guild in Ephilia pursuing role-playing and romantic adventures.
- 창천 길드 (Changcheon Guild) – Orientation: A combat guild characterized by a free-spirited atmosphere and laissez-faire attitude.

- 수렵연구회 길드 (Hunting Research Society Guild)
– Orientation: A guild primarily focused on discovering and hunting various types of monsters. The "Research" is merely a name; it's an adventuring party.
- 마스터피스 길드 (Masterpiece Guild) – Orientation: A production guild that values craftsmanship and lore.
